game.name: New Platform
game.description:
This brand new adventure game has reminded all of us about the early-90s childhood when Maria adventures was everywhere. Your objective in this brand new free online game is to cover as much distance you can to hit the best score on the screen. Challenges can be of different forms, like small animals on the platform or flying in the clouds! Press the start button to go on the straightforward left-to-right levels! It will be amazing to go through different routes while helping your character to run, jump and avoid being dying!?

Jumping, running, and coin-collecting is a great fun in this Mario inspired platform game! Music is soothing and the gameplay is seamless, so once you get connected with this world you are rest assured of exploring the game again and again in your device. The colourful background can help keep you connected with it for hours. With plentiful golden coins, hidden blocks and secret crannies, this cute HTML5 game is playable for all. Hit as many blocks as possible to find some hidden rewards! Jump over the enemies to take them away from the game!

Only platform-hopping prowess can help to guide you towards the triumph! Jump perfectly to avoid your death that might come quickly and frequently! Lots of fun secrets will surprise you when you plan to explore this fun platform game till the end! Keep moving and try to complete the level wisely since you have only 3 lives to achieve the goal of the game! Good luck to join the best platform games that have ever introduced in the last few years!?
